title: Spirit Tree (Farming)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Spirit Trees are trees that may be grown with the Farming skill. Level 83 farmers may grow a spirit tree by planting a spirit sapling in a spirit tree patch using a spade. Spirit trees may be tended by gnome gardeners for 5 monkey nuts, 1 monkey bar, and 1 ground suqah tooth.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Spirit Tree (Farming)

Spirit Trees are trees that may be grown with the Farming skill. Level 83 farmers may grow a spirit tree by planting a spirit sapling in a spirit tree patch using a spade. Spirit trees may be tended by gnome gardeners for 5 monkey nuts, 1 monkey bar, and 1 ground suqah tooth.

The growing time for a spirit tree is about 58 hours and 40 minutes. Growing a spirit tree yields 19,501.3 Farming experience, which is the sum of planting (199.5 experience) and checking health (19,301.8 experience).

Players can plant their own spirit tree from a spirit sapling in their Superior Garden at level 75 Construction. Doing so also requires level 83 in Farming. Boosts can be used. This tree does not count towards the number of spirit trees that may be planted at one time. At level 95 Construction players can build a Spiritual Fairy Tree, which grants access to both a spirit tree and a fairy ring.

Spirit trees cannot be cut down, so one simply uses a spade on the tree to remove it. They do not yield roots when removed.

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Spirit Tree
Level required 83
Patch Spirit tree
Seeds per 1
Payment 5 monkey nuts, 1 monkey bar, and 1 ground tooth
Growth time 3,840 min (12x320 min = 64 hours)
Regrow No
Navigation
Seed Spirit seed
Seedling Spirit seedling
Sapling Spirit sapling
Plant Spirit Tree
Experience
Planting XP 199.5 xp
Checking XP 19,301 xp
Harvesting XP No
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Leaves1Always[d 1][d 2]Not sold0
  1. ^ Requires pruning with (magic) secateurs to cure disease.
  2. ^ Only dropped by Diseased version.

Spirit tree patches[edit | edit source]

Players can grow a single spirit tree at level 83 Farming, two at level 91, and an unlimited amount at level 99.

Location Nearby activities Closest teleport Image
South-east Etceteria
Gardener: Yulf Squecks
  • Advisor Ghrim (Managing Miscellania)
  • Sea snakes
  • Bush patch
  • Ship to Rellekka
  • Ring of wealth to Miscellania
  • Fairy ring code cip
  • Enchanted lyre/Fremennik sea boots teleport, then run north to the boat
  • Rellekka house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab, then run north to the boat
East of Port Sarim
Gardener: Frizzy Skernip
  • Ship to Void Knights' Outpost
  • Ship to Entrana
    • Law Altar at Entrana
  • Ship to Great Kourend
  • Charter ship
  • Port Sarim and Rimmington shops
  • Draynor Village farming patches
  • Explorer's ring 2 or higher
  • Amulet of glory to Draynor Village
  • Rimmington house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
North of Brimhaven
Gardener: Praistan Ebola
  • Fruit tree patch
  • Brimhaven Dungeon
  • Brimhaven Agility Arena
  • Calquat tree patch
  • Charter ship (Port Sarim spot is slightly better)
  • Brimhaven house portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Karamja gloves 3/4 to Shilo Village, then take the cart
  • Teleport to Ardougne and take a boat ride to Brimhaven
South-west of Hosidius
Gardener: Lammy Langle
  • Watson
  • Tithe Farm minigame
  • Allotment and flower/Herb patches
  • Charcoal furnace
  • Saltpetre
  • Sand Crabs
  • Mess
  • Forthos Dungeon
  • Skills necklace to Woodcutting Guild
  • Hosidius portal: Teleport to House spell or redirected house tab
  • Xeric's talisman to Xeric's Glade
  • Tithe Farm Grouping teleport
Northern section of the Farming Guild
(85 Farming required)
Gardener: Latlink Fastbell
  • Farming Guild patches
  • Skills necklace to Farming Guild
  • Farming cape teleport
  • Fairy ring code CIR, then run south-west
  • Battlefront Teleport to Battlefront, then run west

'''Spirit Trees''' are trees that may be grown with the [[Farming]] [[skill]]. Level 83 farmers may grow a spirit tree by planting a [[spirit sapling]] in a [[spirit tree patch]] using a [[spade]]. Spirit trees may be tended by [[gnome]] [[Group of Advanced Gardeners|gardeners]] for 5 [[monkey nuts]], 1 [[monkey bar]], and 1 [[Ground tooth|ground suqah tooth]].

The growing time for a spirit tree is about 58 hours and 40 minutes. Growing a spirit tree yields 19,501.3 Farming [[experience]], which is the sum of planting (199.5 experience) and checking health (19,301.8 experience).

Players can plant their own [[spirit tree (Construction)|spirit tree]] from a [[spirit sapling]] in their [[Superior Garden]] at level 75 [[Construction]]. Doing so also requires level 83 in [[Farming]]. [[Temporary skill boost|Boosts]] can be used. This tree does not count towards the number of spirit trees that may be planted at one time. At level 95 Construction players can build a [[Spirit tree & fairy ring|Spiritual Fairy Tree]], which grants access to both a spirit tree and a [[Fairy rings|fairy ring]].

Spirit trees cannot be cut down, so one simply uses a [[spade]] on the tree to remove it. They do not yield roots when removed.
